src:
Mehmet Ali Erbil taburcu oldu
Ünlü şovmen Mehmet Ali Erbil evinde geçirdiği kalp spazmı sonrası yoğun bakıma alınmıştı. Hastanede tedavi gören Erbil, taburcu oldu.

01 Nov 2019, 06:07

‘Kaçış Sendromu' hastalığının nüksetmesi nedeniyle 258 gün boyunca yoğun bakımda yatan Mehmet Ali Erbil, Temmuz ayında taburcu olmuştu.
Taburcu olduktan sonra dostlarıyla objektiflerin karşısına geçen Erbil, önceki gün  kalp spazmı geçirerek tekrar hastaneye kaldırıldı.
Hastanede 2 gün tedavi gören Mehmet Ali Erbil, taburcu oldu.
GÖRÜNTÜ VERMEMEK İÇİN OTOPARKTAN ÇIKTI
Hastanede dün akşam saatlerinde tedavisi biten ünlü şovmen Erbil taburcu oldu.
Basın mensuplarına görüntü vermemek için tedavi gördüğü hastanenin otoparkında çıkan Erbil’in bir süre evinde doktor gözetimi altında olacağı bilgisine ulaşıldı.
text:
Mehmet Ali Erbil was discharged
Famous entertainer Mehmet Ali Erbil was taken to intensive care after heart spasm in his home. Erbil, who was being treated in hospital, was discharged.

01 Nov 2019, 06:07

Mehmet Ali Erbil, who was hospitalized in intensive care unit for 258 days due to relapse of ‘Escape Syndrome hast, was discharged in July.
After being discharged from his friends in front of the lenses in the face of Erbil, the previous day passed to the hospital by passing heart spasm.
Mehmet Ali Erbil was hospitalized for 2 days and was discharged.
OUT OF THE CAR PARK TO MAKE NO IMAGES
The hospital was discharged from the famous entertainer Erbil who ended his treatment yesterday evening.
Erbil, which was treated in the parking lot of the hospital where he was being treated to avoid giving images to the press, was informed that he would be under the supervision of a doctor at his home for a while.
